  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    iServeComponent, ServiceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceManagerIndexRdf

    public class ServiceManagerSparql
extends IntegratedComponent
implements ServiceManager

      • listTypedInputs

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<URI,URI> listTypedInputs(URI operationUri)
        Given an operation, this method obtains the list of input URIs mapped to their annotated types (i.e., modelReferences). Note that the same input may have several annotations indicating the type.
        Specified by:
        listTypedInputs in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        operationUri - the URI for which we want to obtain the inputs and their annotated types
        Returns:
        a Multimap with the inputs and their corresponding types.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • addService

        public URI addService(uk.ac.open.kmi.msm4j.Service service)
               throws ServiceException
        Creates a Service Description in the system. Only needs to be fed with an MSM Service description. After successfully adding a service, implementations of this method should raise a ServiceCreatedEvent
        Specified by:
        addService in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        service - the input service description in terms of MSM
        Returns:
        the URI this service description was saved to
        Throws:
        ServiceException

                                           URI relatedDocument)
                                    throws ServiceException
        Relates a given document to a service. The relationship is just a generic one.
        Specified by:
        addRelatedDocumentToService in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        serviceUri - the service URI
        relatedDocument - the related document URI
        Returns:
        True if successful or False otherwise
        Throws:
        ServiceException

                      throws ServiceException

        Specified by:
        deleteService in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        serviceUri - the URI of the service to delete
        Returns:
        True if it was deleted or false otherwise
        Throws:

                      throws ServiceException

        Specified by:

        Throws:

      • listServicesWithModelReference

        public Set<URI> listServicesWithModelReference(URI modelReference)
        Given the URI of a modelReference, this method figures out all the services that have this as model references. This method uses SPARQL 1.1 to avoid using regexs for performance.
        Specified by:
        listServicesWithModelReference in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the type of output sought for
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs of operations that generate this output type.

      • listOperationsWithModelReference

        public Set<URI> listOperationsWithModelReference(URI modelReference)
        Given the URI of a modelReference, this method figures out all the operations of which services have this as model references. This method uses SPARQL 1.1 to avoid using regexs for performance.
        Specified by:
        listOperationsWithModelReference in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the type of output sought for
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs of operations that generate this output type.

      • getMsmType

        public Set<URI> getMsmType(URI elementUri)
        Given the URI of an element, this method returns the URI of the element from the Minimal Service Model it corresponds to. That is, it will say if it is a service, operation, etc. This method uses SPARQL 1.1 to avoid using regexs for performance.
        Specified by:
        getMsmType in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        elementUri - the URI to get the element type for.
        Returns:
        the URI of the MSM type it corresponds to.

      • listModelReferences

        public Set<URI> listModelReferences(URI elementUri)
        Obtains the list of model references for a given element.
        Specified by:
        listModelReferences in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        elementUri - the URI of the element for which we want to obtain the model references
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs with the model references of the given element. If there are no model references the Set should be empty NOT null.

      • listElementsAnnotatedWith

        public Set<URI> listElementsAnnotatedWith(URI modelReference)
        Given a modelReference, this method finds all the elements that have been annotated with it. This method finds exact annotations. Note that the elements can be services, operations, inputs, etc.
        Specified by:
        listElementsAnnotatedWith in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the actual annotation we are looking for
        Returns:
        a set of URIs for elements that have been annotated with the requested modelReferences.

      • listOperationsWithInputType

        public Set<URI> listOperationsWithInputType(URI modelReference)
        Given the URI of a type (i.e., a modelReference), this method figures out all the operations that have this as part of their inputs.
        Specified by:
        listOperationsWithInputType in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the type of input sought for
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs of operations that can take this as input type.

      • listOperationsWithOutputType

        public Set<URI> listOperationsWithOutputType(URI modelReference)
        Given the URI of a type (i.e., a modelReference), this method figures out all the operations that have this as part of their inputs.
        Specified by:
        listOperationsWithOutputType in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the type of output sought for
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs of operations that generate this output type.

        Specified by:
        listServicesWithInputType in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:
        modelReference - the type of input sought for
        Returns:
        a Set of URIs of services that can take this as input type.

        Specified by:
        listServicesWithOutputType in interface ServiceManager
        Parameters:

        Returns:
